updateElements.mainContentText:
Your F&M-issued computer does not have the latest version of your current operating system.

Updates will be installed automatically in $oldCount days, and your machine will reboot automatically when the updates are installed. You will recieve this message once each day until then.

As soon as you are able, please save your work and install updates. This keeps your machine running smoothly and securely. This update will require your machine to restart, which will happen automatically.

If you have any questions, please contact the ITS Help Desk at 717-358-6789, or submit a ticket at helpdesk.fandm.edu.
